The Anatomy of a Website

Blog > Tutorials > Website anatomy
#HTML
#CSS
#Beginner

For newcomers, jumping straight into code can be a daunting task. For somebody thatâ€™s been creating websites for a while, the layout of a HTML page might seem simple, or even obvious. This is the curse of knowledge at its peak here, so in this article I will be reverse-engineering a website in ways, so that you can see exactly how it is built, and why it is built the way it is.
